title: cyDisputing other parts of the claim
captionHeading: cyRespond to a property possession claim
content:
cyYou should view the claim (opens in new tab) to see if there's any other parts of the claim that are incorrect or you disagree with.

cyThis includes:

  • cy {{claimantName}}'s grounds for possession (their reasons for making the claim)
  • cyany documents they've uploaded to support their claim
  • cyany other information they've given as part of their claim

disputeDetails.label: cyExplain which parts of the claim you do not agree with
